Package com.larkwoodlabs.net.amt

Provides interfaces and classes used to implement the Automatic Multicast Tunneling (AMT) protocol.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
AmtMessage.ParserType The parser interface for AMT messages.
 

Class Summary
AmtMembershipQueryMessage Represents an AMT Membership Query message.
AmtMembershipQueryMessage.Parser An AMT Membership Query message parser/factory.
AmtMembershipUpdateMessage Represents an AMT Membership Update message.
AmtMembershipUpdateMessage.Parser An AMT Membership Update message parser/factory.
AmtMessage Base class for all AMT message classes.
AmtMessage.Parser Base AMT message parser.
AmtMulticastDataMessage Represents an AMT Multicast Data message.
AmtMulticastDataMessage.Parser An AMT Multicast Data message parser/factory.
AmtRelayAdvertisementMessage Represents an AMT Relay Advertisement message.
AmtRelayAdvertisementMessage.Parser An AMT Relay Advertisement message parser/factory.
AmtRelayDiscoveryMessage Represents an AMT Relay Discovery message.
AmtRelayDiscoveryMessage.Parser An AMT Relay Discovery message parser/factory.
AmtRequestMessage Represents an AMT Request message.
AmtRequestMessage.Parser An AMT Request message parser/factory.
AmtTeardownMessage Represents an AMT Teardown message.
AmtTeardownMessage.Parser An AMT Teardown message parser/factory.
GroupMembershipRecord Describes the current reception state, or a change in reception state for a single multicast group address.
IPv4MembershipQueryTransform Transforms an IPPacket object containing an IGMPv3 query message into a protocol-independent MembershipQuery object.
IPv4MembershipReportTransform Transforms a protocol-independent MembershipReport object into an IPPacket object containing an IGMPv3 report message.
IPv6MembershipQueryTransform Transforms an IPPacket object containing an MLDv2 query message into a protocol-independent MembershipQuery object.
IPv6MembershipReportTransform Transforms a protocol-independent MembershipReport object into an IPPacket object containing an MLDv2 report message.
MembershipQuery A protocol-independent representation of an IGMPv3 or MLDv2 query message.
MembershipReport A protocol-independent representation of an IGMPv3 or MLDv2 report message.
SourceFilter Describes the current reception state for a single multicast group address.
 

Enum Summary
GroupMembershipRecord.Type Enumeration of group record types.
SourceFilter.Mode An enumeration of filter modes.
 

Package com.larkwoodlabs.net.amt Description

Provides interfaces and classes used to implement the Automatic Multicast Tunneling (AMT) protocol.
